note: Firelink Shrine is the residence of the Fire Keeper.
Firelink Shrine houses one of the most important bonfires in Lordran.
Logan mentions Firelink Shrine as a safe place after being rescued.
Serves as the main hub for travel and interactions in Lordran.
Adjacent region connected by iron bars
City was sealed away by powerful magic and banishment sorcerers to contain the Abyss and the Darkwraiths.
Tin Banishment Catalyst is found in New Londo Ruins.
Fallen city where the Darkwraiths originated.
Darkwraiths' ability of Lifedrain is linked to this region.
Ingward resides here, guarding the seal placed over the Abyss.
Four Kings once ruled the city before succumbing to the Dark.
City known for cursed ghosts and haunted atmosphere.
Mentioned as housing a healer connected to curse treatment.
Associated with ember used by Vamos for smithing.
The Abyss is the origin of dark sorceries associated with human souls and physical damage.
Artorias is said to have been consumed by the Abyss during his attempt to resist it.
The Abyss overtook Oolacile and is associated with the corruption of the land.
The Abyss is considered the home of the Darkwraiths.
Knight Artorias is believed to have traversed the Abyss in legend.
The Undead Burg contains a great bridge connecting major areas.
A basement entrance leads to the Lower Undead Burg.
The area has ties to several missing individuals and tragic fates.
The lower district is known for its increased danger and hostile inhabitants.
Connected via underground passages and key-sealed gate
Located directly beneath Undead Burg
Region sealed off from the Depths and plagued by disease
Region where she resides beneath the swamp
One of the swamp's deep tunnels leads toward the ruins of Izalith
They are both daughters of chaos
She lives hidden beneath the Blighttown swamp
Alternate name used by some NPCs
Parasitic creature tied to this ruined city's depths
Ruined city linked to the failed flame duplication
Can be reached from Blighttown through Demon Ruins
Ash Lake is a mythic subterranean realm and the home of the Stone Dragon, a descendant of the ancient dragons.
Ash Lake is described as a remnant of the Age of Dragons, indicating its existence predates the Age of Fire.
The Stone Dragon resides in Ash Lake and is linked to the ancient dragons.
Darkroot Garden is geographically and thematically connected to Darkroot Basin, often sharing NPC and boss interactions.
Darkroot Garden contains the sealed door that leads to the Grave of Artorias.
The Moonlight Butterfly is a magical creature that dwells in Darkroot Garden.
The Catacombs is home to the reclusive blacksmith Vamos, who specializes in fire and occult weapon smithing.
Reah and her cleric companions pass through the Catacombs as part of their pilgrimage, eventually becoming stranded.
The Tomb of the Giants is a place of death and darkness, associated directly with Nito, first of the dead.
Fortress leads directly to Anor Londo via Iron Golem transport.
Iron Golem stands at the top as the final guardian before Anor Londo.
Mentioned as having attempted to overcome the fortress alone.
Frampt describes it as a house of deadly traps to reach the Realm of Lords.
Silver Knights protect the halls and paths of Anor Londo.
Painting Guardians patrol the rafters of the cathedral.
The Giant Blacksmith crafts weapons imbued with lightning.
Gwyndolin guards the illusion of the city and defends the Darkmoon tomb.
Ornstein is one of the primary defenders of the cathedral.
Smough fights alongside Ornstein to defend the inner sanctum.
Solaire travels to Anor Londo in pursuit of his own 'sun'.
The archives are Seath's territory and his research domain.
The source of Seath’s immortality is located here.
Priscilla resides in isolation within the painted realm.
The scythe wielded by Priscilla is found here.
The Lordvessel is placed here to access the Kiln of the First Flame.
Solaire carries this shield, decorated with a self-painted sun symbol.
Solaire references this city during his quest for the sun.
Solaire speaks of this dark area in dialogue.
Solaire references this location in connection with his search.
Solaire reveres Gwyn as part of his sun-worshipping beliefs.
Dusk is a princess and royal figure from Oolacile.
Dusk is rescued from a golden golem and later offers sorceries.
Elizabeth references Dusk as a key figure from Oolacile.
Tarkus is recognized as one of the Knights Berenike.
Mentioned among those who failed to reach Anor Londo.
Beatrice is known for facing the Abyss without formal training.
Leeroy is affiliated with the Way of White.
Leeroy wields the powerful Grant weapon.
Kirk is a known Darkwraith.
Jeremiah is found in the Painted World of Ariamis.
Lautrec worships the goddess Fina.
Lautrec references Maiden Thorolund and trades information.
The Demon Firesage is described as the last master of original fire arts and the first demon.
The Capra Demon is noted for being served by wild dogs in the Undead Burg.
The Iron Golem guards Sen's Fortress, testing heroes before they may reach Anor Londo.
Executioner Smough is described as one of the defenders of the cathedral in Anor Londo.
Priscilla is trapped and resides within the Painted World of Ariamis.
Moonlight Butterfly is described as a creature created by Seath the Scaleless.
Moonlight Butterfly flutters in Darkroot Garden.
The Sanctuary Guardian feared the Abyss and had traits similar to demons.
Artorias is explicitly described as one of Gwyn’s Four Knights.
Artorias fought against the Abyss and is closely associated with it.
Ciaran refers to Artorias as 'dear', suggesting a close personal bond.
Artorias saved Dusk from the Abyss long ago.
Artorias is associated with the Greatshield bearing his name (Item ID 1165).
Artorias is associated with the Wolf Ring, symbolic of his indomitable will.
Artorias's grave lies in Darkroot Garden.
Artorias's grave is guarded by the great wolf Sif.
His honor was preserved by the player after his corruption.
Mentioned as a friend of Alvina in the Cat Covenant Ring description.
Manus is considered the origin of the Abyss corruption.
Manus was once human, transformed by wild humanity.
His sorcery Pursuers grants will to the Dark.
Tail source of the Obsidian Greatsword.
Kalameet's eye enchanted the Calamity Ring.
Feared even by the city of Anor Londo.
Sif is guardian of Knight Artorias’s grave.
Sif was Artorias’s loyal companion.
Protected by Artorias’s Cleansing Greatshield.
Sif’s soul is used to craft the Greatshield of Artorias.
Nito slumbers in the Tomb of the Giants.
Nito commands servants who spread death rituals.
Nito holds one of the four Lord Souls needed to fill the Lordvessel.
Target of occult followers who attempt to steal divine power.

Guardian of the cathedral in Anor Londo.
Master of lightning spear combat.
